participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Alex enjoys exploring new experiences and maintaining a sense of freedom.
participant_1.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i have three dogs. i like to watch the olympics.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, Jordan loves to share his culinary adventures and bond over a good story.
participant_2.background: if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. spiderman is my favorite. l also love comic books.
